item.title: About
item.description: Hello, I’m Garrett, a professional software engineer and recent computer science major. Iâ€™m proficient in Python and C++, and familiar with web development in Html, CSS, and javascript. My goal is to further expand my knowledge in software development. Linux and Coding I was introduced to Linux at the age of nine. My uncle installed Ubuntu on an old computer and gave it to me to try. Suffice to say I was not impressed, but as I got older I returned to using Linux with zorin.
